name: burntop
description: Gamified AI usage tracking platform for developers
author: burntop contributors

scripts.dev: bun run dev:backend & bun run dev:frontend
scripts.dev:backend: cd packages/backend && uv run uvicorn src.app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.build: bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: echo 'Backend build not required - Python runtime'
scripts.lint:backend: cd packages/backend && uv run ruff check src/
scripts.lint:backend:fix: cd packages/backend && uv run ruff check --fix src/
scripts.format:backend: cd packages/backend && uv run ruff format src/
scripts.typecheck:backend: cd packages/backend && uv run mypy src/
scripts.test: bun run test:frontend && bun run test:backend
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/backend && uv run alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:rollback: cd packages/backend && uv run alembic downgrade -1
scripts.db:generate: cd packages/backend && uv run alembic revision --autogenerate -m
